name: Braye Beach Hotel

reviews.text: The Braye Beach Hotel is in a great location on the edge of the beach (the name kind of gives it away!) on the (very) quiet island of Alderney. Someone has clearly spent a lot of money creating a lovely, warm, comfortable hotel, which is why the quality of food and service is so disappointing.
reviews.title: A lovely hotel let down a bit by the food
Fantastic hotel
reviews.text: Downstairs is a lovely lounge and an indoor cinema (never used the cinema, however, as the quality of films being shown in our time there was pretty poor, which was a real shame). The bar has a great indoor/outdoor feel to it and lots of non-residents use it due to the location, which gives it a nice buzz.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: What lets the hotel down is it's food and service. On food, both breakfast and dinner were poor - e.g. for breakfast, limited quantities of fruit, for dinner I didn't really enjoy anything other than the cheeses for dessert. Service was poor in that the staff seemed to be mainly students on their long vacation so the attention to detail was not there. Little idea on recommending things to do or sorting out entertainment and the food/drinks service was haphazard in that what you ordered sometimes didn't appear.
reviews.title: Wonderful Hotel

reviews.text: To conclude, a lovely hotel, but sort out the food and improve the service and it'd be an absolute cracker.
reviews.title: At last a fab hotel in Alderney!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: you will not be disappointed with the rooms, the food or the view. An easy hotel to recommend.
reviews.title: Fantastic Location

description: Without doubt the most luxurious hotel in Alderney, the stunning Braye Beach Hotel has one of the most spectacular views you could wish for, standing picture-perfect on the edge of Alderney's finest sandy beach. This stylish and elegant hotel offers the highest standards of food, accommodation and personal service. With the style and elegance of a luxury small hotel, the finer points of hospitality come as standard.
